description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to strengthen the financial and institutional capacity of the Bulgarian Deposit Insurance Fund(BDIF) so as to enable it to meet its deposit insurance and bank resolution obligations.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :BDIF Reserves are less than the cumulative amount of the BDIF Transfers | Description :Exceptions: (i) paymentsin an equivalent amount made by the Borrower to fulfill its deposit insurance and bank resolution obligations, in accordance withthe Deposit Insurance Legislation, not including repayment of funds borrowed from entities other than the Guarantor, or (ii) aninvestment loss, when the investments of BDIF Reserves were made in accordance with the Deposit Insurance Legislation | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Deposit Insurance Legislation | Description :The Deposit Insurance Legislation has been amended, suspended,abrogated, repealed or waived so as to affect materially and adversely the ability of the Borrower to: (i) perform any of itsobligations under this Agreement; or (ii) carry out its deposit insurance and bank resolution obligations. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

title.narrative: Long-term loan or back-stop funding facility mobilized by BDIF
BDIF reserves reach the equivalent of 1 percent of covered deposits, in the absence of bank failures
BDIF performing its legally mandated technical functions, including in any future bank failures in which its resources are utilized
Results of Asset Quality Review shared with BDIF
